title: When Is Nighttime?
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 54 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: What happens when nighttime falls? Look out the window to see. This book tells about many things we see and do when it is nighttime. Delightful illustrations add humor.
meta: blink, lights, nighttime, rises, shine, sleep

Cause and Effect : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
Sound Symbol Relationship : Associate the letter Nn with the /n/ sound
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize and punctuate sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
